original_title: ノーマン・ザ・スノーマン～北の国のオーロラ～
overview: The boy has longed to visit the northern country and experience the beautiful mysteries of nature that his childhood friend Norman the Snowman has told him about. On the first day of snow in the northern country, the boy sneaks out of his house and boards a northbound train with Norman to see the mysteries of nature with his own eyes.
title: Norman the Snowman: The Northern Lights
